alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 1:34PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lake County through 200 PM CDT... At 134 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Split Rock Lighthouse, to Castle Danger, to near Two Harbors, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Split Rock Lighthouse around 150 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Finland, Silver Bay, Beaver Bay and Illgen City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
